duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide ongoing assistance in all aspects of client engagements and oversight of administrative tasks.
Plan, execute, and finalize projects according to strict deadlines, coordinating team members and clients to deliver projects according to plan.
Proactively manage changes in scope, identify potential crises, and devise contingency plans.
Arrange all scheduling, including client meetings, reference calls, and business development meetings.
Manage complex calendars, prioritize meetings/calls, and arrange and coordinate detailed travel plans.
Serve as client liaison, act as the single point of contact for all key logistical matters, and communicate directly on behalf of the consultant.
Produce high quality client deliverables, ensuring completion within designated timeframes and assisting with billing and client invoicing.
Create and own the process to drive the Consultant’s business development strategy and collaborate on the production of marketing presentations and materials.
